definition: ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: She accepts that her smaller bust may be a factor.
sentences.chinese: 她承认她的胸部较小也是一个因素。

sentences.english: She leaned on my chest. I could smell the fragrance of her blouse.
sentences.chinese: 妻斜靠在我胸部上，我还闻得到她外套上芳香的味道。

sentences.english: Almost had to use a bottle, some tight chest than before.
sentences.chinese: 差不多曾经用了一瓶，胸部较之前有些紧实。

sentences.english: Nothing says "novice" like a lunging, line-drive shot that comes from your chest.
sentences.chinese: 突破，急停然后从胸部出手投篮，说明你是一个新手。

sentences.english: Results Injuries of the trachea and bronchi were of high frequency in severe chest and neck trauma.
sentences.chinese: 结果严重胸部损伤病人通常伴有气管支气管损伤。

sentences.english: Why do male robins have red breasts?
sentences.chinese: 为什么雄性欧亚鸲胸部呈红色？

sentences.english: Notice that the movement of your belly and chest rises and falls like the motion of rolling waves.
sentences.chinese: 注意，腹部和胸部的起落运动，就像翻滚的波浪。

sentences.english: He complained of having a chest.
Objective To study the feasibility of spiral CT scanning of chest using low dose contrast agent.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价胸部螺旋CT应用小剂量对比剂的可行性。

sentences.english: Chest X-ray is the most reliable method for a diagnosis.
sentences.chinese: 认真的胸部X线电视透视是最可靠的检查方法。

sentences.english: Eyad's father was shot in the heart and his mother in the chest.
sentences.chinese: Eyad得父亲心脏中枪，他得妈妈胸部中枪。

sentences.english: Shooting pains were assailing my arms and chest, and the muscles in my legs were joining in.
sentences.chinese: 胳膊和胸部的疼痛一阵阵袭来，然后是大腿。

sentences.english: Sterile drapes were whisked onto the patient's chest and pelvis.
sentences.chinese: 护士将无菌手术巾铺在病人胸部和骨盆上。

sentences.english: Bench presses are one exercise that can increase chest muscles.
sentences.chinese: 卧推练习能增强胸部肌肉。

sentences.english: Solution for flat breast, left-right asymmetry.
sentences.chinese: 解决胸部平坦，左右不对称。

sentences.english: Any of a breed of domestic pigeons having a small crested head and a ruffled breast.
sentences.chinese: 浮羽鸽家鸽的一个品种，头小有冠，有皱褶的胸部。

definition: pectoralis major muscle (across the top of the chest)
